<title level="1" right="Rules">[Special Checks](/Rules.aspx?ID=332)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 450 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some categories of checks follow special rules. The most notable are flat checks and secret checks.
</column>

</column>

</row>
